General Index to First Ten Annual Reports of the Archivist, University of Virginia Library, 1930-31 to 1939-40 This index will serve as a partial guide to the manuscript and newspaper collections in the Alderman Library of the University of Virginia. The archivist's annual reports do not include some of the smaller collections and numerous single items. Information on these is available in a card index in the Rare Books and Manuscripts Division of the Library. The annual reports contain, however, considerable material on developments and problems in the closely related fields of archives, manuscripts, and libraries during the 1930's, and this material is quite fully indexed. It should be noted that, since most of the manuscript material in the Alderman Library is on Virginia, the subjects on which data will be found are listed as main headings and only a few appear as sub-headings under "Virginia." For valuable aid in compiling and checking this index I wish to thank Mrs. Helen Bullock, Miss Louise Daniel, and Messrs. Marvin J. Colangelo, N. Gordon LeBert, Glenn Curtis Smith, and John C. Wyllie. Lester J. Cappon Archivist
